thread.section_title: LaserAway Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LaserAway | www.laseraway.com | 4 of 32
thread.title: Devin

author: Devin
title: Devin
text: Shelly was by far the best nurse I've had! She was informative and so welcoming! My black tattoo located on my neck is 85% gone within 4 sessions. Shelly took time to understand my lifestyle and how I personally felt about my experience with the tattoo removal. She made sure I was happy and comfortable the whole time. As she said "it doesn't have to be painful." She took the time to ice the treatment area about 1.5-2 mins before starting. I didn't feel a thing! Thanks Shelly :)
